Package edu.iupui.ulib.maven.fileweaver

A Maven plugin to assemble one or more files from various parts, where each part may be either an external fragment file or literal text.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
HelpMojo Display help information on FileWeaver.
Call
Output Attributes of a file to be assembled.
Part Represent a portion of an output file: literal text, or an input file.
Weave Build files from external and literal portions, with filtering.
 

Package edu.iupui.ulib.maven.fileweaver Description

A Maven plugin to assemble one or more files from various parts, where each part may be either an external fragment file or literal text. Parts may be filtered during assembly, interpolating property values from various sources.
